author: jstrachan
msg: Initial version of a plugin which can take HTML and turn it into the xdoc format ready for styling by the xdoc plugin.
This allows developers to use good old HTML (and some WYSIWYG tool) to edit & maintain documentation and get it included in the same site documentation as all the xdoc stuff

author: jstrachan
msg: added support for the eclipse output directory to be configurable from a user defined property

author: bwalding
msg: o MAVEN-283: Fix extraneous whitespace problems
